channel.title: Mathjax on Hugo Profile
channel.description: Recent content in Mathjax on Hugo Profile

item.title: Experience
item.description: Having completed high school with a strong foundation in computer science, my journey into the realm of programming began. I eagerly delved into the world of coding, initially focusing on Python and C. As I immersed myself in these languages, my proficiency grew steadily, and I found myself increasingly captivated by the intricate art of programming. Beyond the mere acquisition of technical skills, I discovered a profound passion for problem-solving and creative expression through code.
